'''Martial Artist''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:3-Star Artifacts|3-star]] and [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[The Lost Valley]], [[Hidden Palace of Zhou Formula]] and [[Ridge Watch]].

==Notes==
* The [[Adventurer Handbook]] gives out four 3{{star}} Martial Artist Artifacts between [[Adventurer Handbook#Chapter 4|Chapter 4]] and 5's tasks:
** Enhance 6 artifacts to Lv. 4 for Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
** Hunt down an [[Electro Cicin Mage]] for Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
** Unlock a [[Shrine of Depths]] for Martial Artist's Bandana
** Clear Spiral Abyss 1-3 for Martial Artist's Wine Cup
